artist: Artist: Brian Lynch , et al.; Author: Ben Satterfield , et al.; Publisher: Mark Stephen Souder
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, illustration of a shirtless person, wearing angel wings, sitting on steps, with outlined text along the right edge; 32 pp.
title: Sign of the Times, Volume Four, Number Four: A Chronicle of Decadence In The Atomic Age
